mc.name: Phyrexian War Beast
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves play, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Shield Sphere
mc.oracleText:
Defender
Whenever Shield Sphere blocks, put a -0/-1 counter on it.

mc.name: Ghazbán Ogre
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than any other, that player gains control of Ghazbán Ogre.

mc.name: Ifh-Biff Efreet
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{G}: Ifh-Biff Efreet deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may play this ability.

mc.name: Juzám Djinn
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzám Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

mc.name: Ring of Ma'rûf
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}, Remove Ring of Ma'ruf from the game: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

mc.name: Márton Stromgald
mc.oracleText:
Whenever Márton Stromgald attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each attacking creature other than Márton Stromgald.
Whenever Márton Stromgald blocks, other blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each blocking creature other than Márton Stromgald.

mc.name: Adun Oakenshield
mc.oracleText: {B}{R}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.name: Zuran Orb
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: You gain 2 life.

mc.name: Khabál Ghoul
mc.oracleText: At end of turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Khabál Ghoul for each creature put into a graveyard from play this turn.

mc.name: Chains of Mephistopheles
mc.oracleText: If a player would draw a card except the first one he or she draws in his or her draw step each turn, that player discards a card instead. If the player discards a card this way, he or she draws a card. If the player doesn't discard a card this way, he or she puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Energy Arc
mc.oracleText: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.

mc.name: Lim-Dûl's Vault
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

mc.name: Centaur Archer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

mc.name: Shield of the Ages
mc.oracleText: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
